resources.string: ₹1000 tak jeetein kewal app par rahein & kuchh sawaalon ke jawaab dein aur apna inaam claim karein
Aaj ki jeetne wali team chunein
Is match ke sab se zyada run banane wale batsman ko chunein
Is match ke sab se zyada wicket lene wale bowler ko chunein

1. Team chunein: -> Batsman chunein -> Bowler chunein -> OkPL game ke dauran poochhe gaye ek sawaal ka jawaab dein.
2. Match ka Score = [30 (pehle 3 sawaalon ka jawab dene ke liye) + Batsman ke runs + (Bowler ke Wicket x 20 runs) + 50 runs (Agar aapki team jeet jaayein to)] x booster gunnank (Booster sawaal ka jawaab dene ke liye)

Har match ke lucky 1000 jeetenge ₹100 tak ke inaam.
Hint: OkPL game ke dauran poochhe gaye sawaalon ka jawaab dene par aapka total score booster se multiply kiya jayega. To jawaab dena na bhoolein.

1. Team chunein: -> Batsman chunein -> Bowler chunein -> OkPL game ke dauran poochhe gaye ek sawaal ka jawaab dein.

Aaj ki Game screen par dikhaya gaya is hafte ka pehla Booster task poora karein
Aaj ki Game screen par dikhaya gaya is hafte ka doosra Booster task poora karein
YAYY!\nAapne pehla Booster Task poora kar liya hai
YAYY!\nAapne doosra Booster Task poora kar liya hai
HURRAY!!\nAapne pichle 7 din mein %s runs score kiye hai
Tip: Apne score ko behtar banane ke liye game ke end me mystery runs collect karte rahein!
Badhaai Ho!\nAap Saptahik Lucky Draw ke liye qualify ho gaye hain.
Tap karein & mystery runs collect karein
Yayy!! Scratch karein & lucky draw prizes collect karein!!!

1. Is hafte OkPL matches ke dauran poochhe gaye kam se kam %d booster sawaalon ka jawaab dein -> Is week me %d runs banayein
2. Sunday dopahar 3 baje se Saturday raat 11:59 baje tak yeh hafta chalega
3. Weekly draw har Sunday dopahar 12 baje ghoshit kiya jayega
4. Saptahik draw ke score match ke ek ghante baad update kiye jayenge

Har Sunday, game khelne wale 500 players ₹1000 tak ke inaam paayenge.
Hint: Zyada se zyada booster sawaalon ka jawaab de kar jeetne ka mauka paayein.

resources.string:
• Jeetne wale pehle 10 players ₹15,000 ke 2.5 gm ke Gold Coins jeetenge
• Agle 25 players ₹10,000 ke inaam jeetenge
• Us ke baad ke 500 players OkCredit ki Jersey jeetenge
• Agle 500 players Delhi Capitals Team ke dwara sign kiye gaye Mini Bats jeetenge
• Match ke ek ghante baad leaderboard update kiya jaayega

Hint: Leaderboard par sab se upar aane ke liye har din khelein aur OkPL match ke dauran poochhe gaye booster sawaalon ka jawaab dein
Yadi aap OkPL game ke chalte huye task poora karte hain, to leaderboard par aane ke aapke chances %d%% se badhenge

OkPL ki saptahik prize screen par aapka swaagat hai! Saptahik draw ke baare me apni progress janne ke liye humein fir se 20th September, dopahar 3 baje bhent dein.

OkPL tournament ke dauraan ₹51 Lakh ke inaam jeetein

Saptahik draw ke liye rules
1. Is hafte OkPL matches ke dauran poochhe gaye kam se kam 2 sawaalon ke jawaab dein (Sunday dopahar 3 baje se Saturday raat 11:59 baje tak yeh hafta chalega)
2. Is saptah 1000 runs banaayein aur qualify ho jaayein

Monday, 21 September, (raat ko) 12:00 baje shuru ho raha hai

Tournament ke dauraan ₹51 Lakh ke inaam jeetein

Pehle 10 vijeetaon ko milenge 2.5 gram ke Gold Coins

Agle 1025 khiladiyon ko milenge sunischit inaam
Badhaai Ho!\nAap aaj ke Lucky Draw ke liye qualify ho gaye hain

resources.string: Maine ek %1$s jeeta hai. Kripaya usse neeche diye gaye address par bhejein %2$s
Aaj ki match me aap hissa nahi le saktein. Kripaya kal fir se khelein.

Score ka hisaab is tarah kiya jaayega.\nAaj ka score = [30 (Pehle 3 sawaalon ka jawaab dene ke liye) + Ballebaaz ke run + (Bowler ke wicket x %1$s runs) + %2$s runs (Agar aapki team jeet jaaye toh)] x Booster Gunnank (Booster sawaal ka jawaab dene ke liye)
Process kar rahe hain…Kripaya pratiksha karein
Reward claim karne ke liye kripaya apne payment details jodein
Reward claim karne ke liye kripaya apne payment details jodein
